targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  sum(hits) AS "id",
  host_name as "host"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' 
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: The total number of challenged IPs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(distinct ip)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Sessions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  CASE
    when human = 1 then 'human'
    when human = 0 then 'bot'
   END as "human"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%'
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and human<>1) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and vpn=1 and human=1) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and human = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  CASE
    when vpn = 1 then 'vpn'
    when vpn = 0 then 'regular'
   END as "vpn"
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and human = 1
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and class = 'ai_bot' and host_name like '%${Host}%' and human=0) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%') * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_address)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and command_type_name like '%block_ip%' and host_name like '%${Host}%') * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  class
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and class <> 'human'
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 3

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS num_sessions,
  case when scraper_name = '' then 'xxx' else concat(host_name, '_',  scraper_name) end 
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and scraper_name <> ''
GROUP BY 1,3
HAVING count(distinct ip_cookie) > 1
ORDER BY 1

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta='') * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

  command_type_name
FROM challenge_command_history

  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' 
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 3

select (SELECT

(SELECT

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta='' and human <>1 and prediction_ae = 1) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta='' and human = 1 and prediction_if = 1) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta='' and human  = 1 and prediction_ae = 1) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  host_name as "host"
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta = ''
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta <> '') * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

  count(distinct ip_address)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta <> ''

panels.title: Meta #

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  CASE
    when human = 1 then 'human'
    when human = 0 then 'bot'
   END as "human"
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' 
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie) as num,
  meta
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta <> ''
group by 2 order by num desc

select A.time, A.host, num_challenged *100.0 / num_sessions as "challenge_rate" from
 (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "num_challenged",
  host_name as "host"
FROM challenge_command_history cch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta = ''
GROUP BY 1,3 
) as A inner join (

	SELECT
	  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
	  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "num_sessions",
	  host_name as "host"
	FROM sessions
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%'
	GROUP BY 1,3
	
) as B on A.time=B.time and A.host=B.host where num_sessions > 10 order by time;

select A.time, A.host, num_challenged *100.0 / num_sessions as "challenge_rate" from
 (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "num_challenged",
  host_name as "host"
FROM challenge_command_history cch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and (meta <> '')
GROUP BY 1,3 
) as A inner join (

	SELECT
	  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
	  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "num_sessions",
	  host_name as "host"
	FROM sessions
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%'
	GROUP BY 1,3
	
) as B on A.time=B.time and A.host=B.host where num_sessions > 50 order by time;

panels.description: The total number of challenged IPs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count (distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Passed

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "num_challenged",
  meta as "meta"
FROM challenge_command_history cch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta <> ''
GROUP BY 1,3

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id", 
  host_name as host
FROM sessions 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end)
  and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%'
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_address)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%') * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_address)
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end)  and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

select (SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%' and bot_score > 0.5 and bot_score_top_factor <> 'no_payload' ) * 100.0 / 
(
(SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie)
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%')
)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  bot_score_top_factor
FROM sessions 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end)
  and passed_challenge = 1 and host_name like '%${Host}%'
  and bot_score > 0.5 and bot_score_top_factor <> 'err_payload' and bot_score_top_factor <> 'no_payload'
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct ip_cookie) as num,
  shapley_feature
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta = ''
group by 2 order by num desc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  shapley_feature_if as "host"
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta = ''
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS "id",
  shapley_feature_ae as "host"
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' and meta = ''
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(session_end,$__interval),
  count(distinct ip_cookie) AS num_sessions,
  case when fingerprints is null then 'xxx' else concat(host_name, '_',  fingerprints) end 
FROM sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '%${Host}%' 
GROUP BY 1,3
HAVING count(distinct ip_cookie) > 10
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  *
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '${Host}' 
limit 1000

SELECT
  *
FROM challenge_command_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(session_end) and host_name like '${Host}' and command_type_name like '%block_ip%'
limit 1000
